project.ui.command_line.command_line_ui

class project.ui.command_line.command_line_ui.CommandLineUi(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UiManager

Command-line interface for user interaction, inheriting from UiManager.

personal_user_select(users

dict) -> str: Allows user to select a personal user from a provided dictionary of users.

prompt_select(prompts

dict) -> str: Allows user to select a prompt from a provided dictionary of prompts.

target_user_select() → int[source]

Allows user to enter a target user’s ID.

personal_user_select(users: dict) → str[source]

Allows the user to select a personal user from the given dictionary of users.

Parameters:

  • self – Instance of CommandLineUi.

  • users (dict) – Dictionary of users where keys are user IDs and values are user details.

Returns:

Selected user’s ID.

Return type:

str

prompt_select(prompts: dict) → str[source]

Allows the user to select a prompt from the given list of prompts.

Parameters:

  • self – Instance of CommandLineUi.

  • prompts (dict) – Dictionary of available prompts.

Returns:

Selected prompt.

Return type:

str

Allows the user to enter a target user’s ID.

Parameters:

self – Instance of CommandLineUi.

Returns:

Selected target user’s ID.
